posts.post_title: T206 Lajoie and T206 Mathewson SOLD
posts.post_content:

Lajoie [STRIKE]$250[/STRIKE] $235 shipped and insured.  Mathewson [STRIKE]$350 [/STRIKE] $325 shipped and insured.

Thank you, Rick
Post these on TR on fb these will go quick
